snippet: Twenty-seven wrongful death claims filed with the company’s victim compensation program have been deemed eligible for payment.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-seven wrongful death claims filed with the company’s victim compensation program have been deemed eligible for payment.

headline.main: Death Total Tied to G.M. Flaw Rises to 27, Twice First Estimate
